level.heading: Job growth tax credit.
level.text: A job growth tax credit shall be allowed as provided in subchapter VII-A of this chapter [§ 47-1807.56 et seq.].

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of § 4 of D.C. Law 18-202, see § 715 of Fiscal Year 2011 Supplemental Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-694, January 19, 2011, 58 DCR 662).

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Sections 3 and 4 of D.C. Law 18-202 provided:
"This act shall apply upon the inclusion of its fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan."
Section 715 of D.C. Law 18-370 repealed section 3 of D.C. Law 18-202.
